page.title: 18A normal day
page.content: On Monday I woke up at 7 am. and washed my hair, dressed and had a small bowl of Shreddies. Then I walked up to the coach stop at the top end of Court Hill and caught the school coach at 8.10. After arriving at school I went into registration and collected all the physics home work books, which were taken to the laboratory. After that we lined up for Assembly, during which the Headmaster talked about the school fete. Afterwards we went to our first lesson - Art with Miss Phelps, where we drew "Spot the Difference" pictures.
